title: ISO [I Need] T206 Bill O'Hara (St.L) Variation

posts.post_title: ISO [I Need] T206 Bill O'Hara (St.L) Variation
posts.post_content:
I am looking for a T206 Bill O'Hara (St. Louis) variation card...up to $1,500.00 based on condition.

Please e-mail scans or clear pictures of front and back to me at [url]mflynn@elitevaletservices.com[/url] 

Thank you,
Michael
